title: Castelblanco Law Group, APLC - San Bernardino

<map name="1837957" theme="dark-prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Castelblanco Law Group, APLC - San Bernardino" id="1"><topic position="477,-61" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[473 E Carnegie Dr #200 San Bernardino California 92408 United States
 +1 909-788-1944
https://castelblanco.com/
info@castelblancolaw.com

The Castelblanco Law Group is a California-based law practice concentrating on 
tenant legal rights and personal injury instances. They focus on representing 
customers dealing with substandard living problems, such as bug infestations and 
lead poisoning, in addition to those hurt in no-fault car mishaps. The company is 
multilingual, offering services in both English and Spanish, and has obtained over 
$200 million in settlements for their customers. They are committed to improving 
the quality of life for renters and guaranteeing justice for personal injury victims.


]]></text></topic></topic></map>
